languages.text: "Послушайте, я всего-то приш{mf|ел|ла} на похороны и назвал{mf|ся|ась} Фиделио. За это меня пытались сжечь заживо, тушили помоями, и вот теперь хотят убить проворовавшиеся коммунальщики. Это как-то слишком за одну неудачную шутку. Можно я просто пойду себе?"

"Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"
languages.original_text: "Послушайте, я всего-то приш{mf|ел|ла} на похороны и назвал{mf|ся|ась} Фиделио. За это меня пытались сжечь заживо, тушили помоями, и вот теперь хотят убить проворовавшиеся коммунальщики. Это как-то слишком за одну неудачную шутку. Можно я просто пойду себе?"

traits.locale_text: "Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel too much like one bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

"Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel too much like one bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

"Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

"Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

languages.text: “你看，我只不过是参加了一场葬礼，说我叫菲迪奥，结果有人打算把我活活烧死，还有人把我泡在了泔水里。现在，就连偷鸡摸狗的公用设备工人都打算要我的命。这不禁让我觉得，这一切都是个不好笑的笑话。我还是过我的开心日子吧，怎么样？”
languages.original_text: "Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

traits.locale_text: “你看，我只不过是参加了一场葬礼，说我叫菲迪奥，结果有人打算把我活活烧死，还有人把我泡在了泔水里。现在，就连偷鸡摸狗的公用设备工人都打算要我的命。这不禁让我觉得，这一切都是个不好笑的笑话。我还是过我的开心日子吧，怎么样？”

languages.text: «Mirad, lo único que he hecho ha sido asistir a un funeral y presentarme como Fidelio. A raíz de esto, alguien ha intentado quemarme viv{mf|o|a}, otra persona me ha cubierto de bazofia y ahora unos trabajadores de mantenimiento ladrones quieren asesinarme. Esto empieza a parecer un chiste malo. ¿Os importaría dejarme ir?».
languages.original_text: "Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

traits.locale_text: «Mirad, lo único que he hecho ha sido asistir a un funeral y presentarme como Fidelio. A raíz de esto, alguien ha intentado quemarme viv{mf|o|a}, otra persona me ha cubierto de bazofia y ahora unos trabajadores de mantenimiento ladrones quieren asesinarme. Esto empieza a parecer un chiste malo. ¿Os importaría dejarme ir?».

languages.text: 「私は葬式に立ち寄ってフィデリオと名乗っただけだ。そのせいで人に生きたまま燃やされ、ある者には汚水の中に突き飛ばされ、今度は施設管理の盗っ人職員に殺されそうになってる。もういい加減にしてくれ。なぜ私を放っておいてくれないんだ？」
languages.original_text: "Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は葬式に立ち寄ってフィデリオと名乗っただけだ。そのせいで人に生きたまま燃やされ、ある者には汚水の中に突き飛ばされ、今度は施設管理の盗っ人職員に殺されそうになってる。もういい加減にしてくれ。なぜ私を放っておいてくれないんだ？」

languages.text: "Also, ich habe lediglich einer Bestattung beigewohnt und mich als Fidelio ausgegeben. Aus diesem Grund wollten mich Leute bei lebendigem Leib verbrennen, andere haben mich in ein Gesöff getaucht, und jetzt wollen diebische Leute vom Arbeitstrupp mich ermorden. Langsam kommt mir das vor wie ein schlechter Witz. Wie wär's, wenn ich einfach meines Weges gehe?"
languages.original_text: "Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

traits.locale_text: "Also, ich habe lediglich einer Bestattung beigewohnt und mich als Fidelio ausgegeben. Aus diesem Grund wollten mich Leute bei lebendigem Leib verbrennen, andere haben mich in ein Gesöff getaucht, und jetzt wollen diebische Leute vom Arbeitstrupp mich ermorden. Langsam kommt mir das vor wie ein schlechter Witz. Wie wär's, wenn ich einfach meines Weges gehe?"

languages.text: « Écoutez, tout ce que j'ai fait, c'est assister à des funérailles en me présentant sous le nom de Fidélio. Depuis, on a essayé de me brûler {mf|vif|vive}, je me suis fait asperger de soupe avariée, et voilà que des ouvriers malhonnêtes veulent me tuer. Je vais finir par croire que c'est une mauvaise blague. Vous ne pourriez pas simplement me laisser poursuivre mon chemin ? »
languages.original_text: "Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, tout ce que j'ai fait, c'est assister à des funérailles en me présentant sous le nom de Fidélio. Depuis, on a essayé de me brûler {mf|vif|vive}, je me suis fait asperger de soupe avariée, et voilà que des ouvriers malhonnêtes veulent me tuer. Je vais finir par croire que c'est une mauvaise blague. Vous ne pourriez pas simplement me laisser poursuivre mon chemin ? »

languages.text: "Bakın, tek yaptığım bir cenazeye uğrayıp kendimi Fidelio olarak tanıtmaktı. Bu yüzden bazıları beni canlı canlı yakmaya çalıştı, diğerleri üstüme yal döktü. Şimdi de hırsız hizmet çalışanları beni öldürmek istiyor. Biri bana eşek şakası yapıyor herhâlde. Bıraksanız da yoluma gitsem."
languages.original_text: "Look, all I did was stop by a funeral and introduce myself as Fidelio. Because of this, some people have attempted to burn me alive, others have drenched me in swill, and now thieving utility workers want to murder me. This is starting to feel like a bad joke. How about I just go on my merry way?"

traits.locale_text: "Tek yaptığım şey bir cenazeye uğrayıp kendimi Fidelio olarak tanıtmaktı. Bu yüzden bazıları beni canlı canlı yakmaya çalıştı, diğerleri beni pis sulara attı. Şimdi de hırsız hizmet çalışanları beni öldürmek istiyor. Tüm bunlar bir şaka olmalı. Bırakın beni de yoluma gideyim."
